metadata.description: Eyes of Fashion Charitable Pieces is a collection of fine art NFTs created by Talia Zoref, that are dedicated to charitable causes and giving. This collection is built on the belief that art can truly be the catalyst for good in the world. The first mint is our Eye Love Ukraine NFT, 200 editions for .1ETH. All proceeds from these sales will be donated to Ukrainian humanitarian relief. Learn more in our Discord. https://linktr.ee/EyesofFashion
metadata.name: Eye Love Ukraine
